title: (x) Display serif in Delta's Sky magazine - H&FJ Chronicle Display {Angel}
content:
Wondering what this lovely serif might be. It's not Poynter Old Style or Miller Headline, the two fonts that immediately came to mind. (It's a typographically adventurous magazine -- they use Reykjavik from Psyops as the house sans.)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150303154025im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sky_type_5070.jpg)
author: marcox

comments.content: Hoefler & Frere-Jones' Chronicle Display it would seem.
Angel, do you have link or any more information?

It's used in a few of their PDFs but there doesn't seem to be much information on the typeface itself.

[http://www.delta-sky.com/advertising/REPS2007.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150303154025/http:/www.delta-sky.com/advertising/REPS2007.pdf "http://www.delta-sky.com/advertising/REPS2007.pdf")
